page.title: 15LIVE AID-A 1985 POP CONCERT
page.content: On 13th July 1985 at Wembley Stadium in England and Philadelphia Stadium in the U.S.A.,the largest pop concert ever was held in aid of famine victims in Ethiopia.It started at 11:50a.m.Saturday and finished at 4a.m.on Sunday,16 hours of non-stop music. Over 80,000 people crowded into Wembley Stadium.The total raised throughout the world so far is Â£50 million,but they hope to raise Â£100 million.The tickets cost Â£25 each.Some of the groups were:Wham!,Boomtown Rats,Duran Duran,U2 and many more. This was all organised by Bob Geldof,the lead singer of Boomtown Rats.The concerts were held in Japan,America and Norway.The money raised will be used for food and transport for the Ethiopian famine victims.
